page.title: 03Notable Events In Otley.
page.content: Only half the planned Otley By-pass was built.The traffic from the Leeds Road is diverted,but the diversion does not carry on to Harrogate Road, not all traffic is diverted.In Otley lots of old buildings have kept their original fronts and have been renovated round the back.Some mills have been renovated inside.Otley carnival has been going for 4 to 5 years.The carnival floats go through Otley.Otley has had a market since 1222.There is a buttercross and a Jubilee Clock, put in in 1887.Recently the market has been recobbled.During this it was moved to Walkergate car-park.The agricultural show in Otley is the oldest in the country starting in 1799.It's held every year at the Accredited Cattle Mart. By Kirsty Hunter and Avruti Shah.
